remarks: Obsolete version of ~ ismnd as of 6-Feb-2020.  The predicate "is a monoid."  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Jan-2015.) (New usage is discouraged.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
ismndOLD.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
ismndOLD.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) $.
ismndOLD $p |- ( G e. MndOLD <-> ( A. a e. B A. b e. B A. c e. B ( ( a .+ b ) e. B /\ ( ( a .+ b ) .+ c ) = ( a .+ ( b .+ c ) ) ) /\ E. e e. B A. a e. B ( ( e .+ a ) = a /\ ( a .+ e ) = a ) ) ) $.
$d .+ a b c e $.
$d B a b c e $.
$d G a b c e $.
